Reviews.Title: dont be a idiot please
Reviews.Author: Mike aims at you
Reviews.Content: other sites sell this for face value your paying  20 extra dollars for nothing (15 for overprice and 5 for shipping)  and on other sites you get the code in a hour or so not a few days.

Reviews.Title: You are not serious are you? Go to Boost website!
Reviews.Author: tapj28
Reviews.Content: You can use the Boost website and pay to refill your phone account from a credit or debit card the only thing added is the tax. So it comes to $3 more than face value. Here you are paying $65 for a $50 or $55 card, plus $5 shipping?????  If you buy this, it would explain why the seller is selling it, because people are buying them at this price.If I give you a $5 dollar bill, will you give me a $20 dollar bill in return? That's what you are doing here...you've been warned!

Reviews.Title: I hope nobody would actually buy this
Reviews.Author: Jeffry DeCola
Reviews.Content: You would need to be insane to actually buy this.  Would you pay $25 for a $20 bill?  If you would, then give me a call. I'll sell you as many $20 bills as you want.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I ORDERED
Reviews.Author: John D.
Reviews.Content: So, I ordered an airtime card from this place for $55 Because THAT WAS WHAT I NEEDED TO GET MY SERVICE. I paid $69.95 for the thing. So yesterday I get an email from them saying they refunded $5.00 to me. I thought that they perhaps changed their minds and figured they were selling the cards for too much money. In the mail today, comes the card, and low and behold - they sent me a computer printout of a pin number for $50.00.If they can do a printout for $50, why not $55. I most definitely will NOT BUY FROM THEM AGAIN. If there was some reason they could not print out a $55 card, they should not be advertising that they do, and they should have canceled the order since pin numbers are not refundable.

Reviews.Title: You got what you paid for
Reviews.Author: diane
Reviews.Content: The minutes work. This is a legit card. You literally get what you paid for. great for the $55 plan.
